metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7697 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In libsamplerate before 0.1.9, a buffer over-read occurs in the calc_output_single function in src_sinc.c via a crafted audio file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsamplerate0 - 0.1.9-1
samplerate-programs - 0.1.9-1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Erik de Castro Lopo and Agostino Sarubbo

criterions.comment: libsamplerate package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.1.9-1').
